name: Shaquille Hewitt
text: Delivered faster than expected. Wonderful customer service and the pizzas looked so good I started eating before this review.

name: Jane Carman
text: The pizza is good. The thin crust is the best in town. Service is always super friendly and quick. The people who work here are fantastic. Orders are accurate. The online ordering system hasn't worked the last few times I've tried.

name: Vickie Joiner
text: This is my first time eating Marco's pizza thin crust, bread stick I love the  Crunchy thin crust and the sauce was great I must say is lot better than Pizza Hut marco's your my pizza guy..

name: Amanda Chavero
text: I've ordered twice. Pizza is consistently yummy. I was charged incorrectly on my second order but it was quickly handled and nothing makes a pizza taste better than great customer service. Thanks, Dan. I'll definitely order again. Probably next week. #comcastpayattention

name: Deborah Sells
text: GREAT üçï Pizza & Subs!! AMAZING deals!! Speedy service too!

name: Sid Thomson
text: Love the food. Fast delivery. Always polite.

name: Margie Wall
text: Best food i ever ate. Prices kinda of high but worth ever mouth full.and family video next door what more could you want?

name: R D
text: Pretty good for the fast food type pizza..Better then Dominos or pizza hut...
